entry.summary: Learn to Drive Unlimited: Â¥168.00 â†’ Â¥148.00
entry.content:

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

**Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app for 7 years running** 97% of learners pass their Theory Test using nothing more than this 4 in 1 AWARD-WINNING app*! Revise with full confidence knowing you have EVERYTHING you need to pass your 2025 Theory Test first time, getting you 1 step closer to your full DVLA licence, or weâ€™ll give you your test fee back if you fail. Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers weâ€™ve helped prepare for their driving theory test. Suitable for: â€¢ Car Drivers in GB & NI â€¢ Motorcyclists in GB & NI â€¢ Trainee ADI's in GB & NI â€¢ HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025 Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions! Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test. Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when youâ€™re ready to sit the official Theory Test! FREE PASS GUARANTEE Weâ€™re so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your Â£23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&Câ€™s apply**. LEARNER PLAN Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish. LEADERBOARD Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! Earn points for acing practice quizzes, passing Mock Tests and more. Revise for a prize as you make the most of your study sessions. SMART AI MODE Want a more tailored approach to revision? Smart AI Mode makes revising for your theory test more efficient and tracks your progress to help you concentrate on the areas where you need the most support. VOICEOVER English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia. HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST 85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test. THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover. ROAD SIGNS 2025 Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions. Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT Includes: â€¢ 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test â€¢ The top 10 reasons for failing â€¢ Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety â€¢ A full mock driving test with examiner debrief â€¢ All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign Helping you get one step closer to your full DVLA licence EXCLUSIVE BONUS CONTENT Access to exclusive offers and discounts! AWARDS: â€¢ Named Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app of 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019 & 2018 â€¢ As featured on the Gadget Show â€¢ Intelligent Instructor Product of the Year 2022, 2023 & 2024 â€¢ App of the Year, FirstCar Awards 2021 & 2019 â€¢ Winner of the Auto Express Theory Test App â€¢ DIA Driver and Rider Training Awards "Product of the Year" CONTACT US: support@drivingtestsuccess.com This app includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank. The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction. Requires account creation to access content. *Based users who complete the Learner Plan in full **Pass Guarantee T&Câ€™s apply. See www.drivingtestsuccess.com/app-pass-guarantee

It's similar to a Photo Sticker machine you see in local stores: Purikura, Icue. We have over 300+ cute sticker for you to create your cute pocket photo. News: This app supports iPad natively with full width and height. Features: - Add frames on your photo - Add stickers on the photo - Add your drawing on the photo - Undo function is provided - Add Text on the image - Position your stickers anywhere you like. - Easy and simple to use. Instruction: First open the photo, then zoom in and out so it position the photo correctly, then click Crop Image Icon. After that, the crop image icon is disabled. It will be active when you start to work on a new photo. Great Fun for my friends in: middle school high school college Student + dorm life University Working class people Keyword: Photo Picture Sticker, Purikura

Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging â€” all in a smart, simple-to-use app. USERS SAYâ€¦ The best Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it! LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!! Fast, intuitive, user friendly I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription. RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE â€¢ Ranked #1 in Forbes Healthâ€™s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025. â€¢ Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. â€¢ Praised by The New York Times as â€œsimpler, quicker, and better-lookingâ€ than other apps. â€¢ Featured in Todayâ€™s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom. DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS â€¢ Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads. â€¢ Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless. â€¢ Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy. â€¢ Privacy Focused: No account required. MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world. PROVEN SUCCESS â€¢ Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week â€¢ Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps A few of the free version features: â€¢ Easy food, exercise, and water tracking. â€¢ Daily coaching tips and meal reminders. â€¢ Customizable dashboard for your goals. â€¢ iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support. â€¢ Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos. SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES â€¢ Up to 108 nutrients tracked â€¢ Plan macros â€¢ Full set of charts â€¢ Timestamps â€¢ Carb tracking If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find: â€¢ Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback. â€¢ Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols. â€¢ Macros planning and cycling. â€¢ Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos. â€¢ Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition. â€¢ Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings. â€¢ In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet. Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers weâ€™ve helped prepare for their driving theory test. Suitable for: â€¢ Car Drivers in GB & NI â€¢ Motorcyclists in GB & NI â€¢ Trainee ADI's in GB & NI â€¢ HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025 Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions! Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test. Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when youâ€™re ready to sit the official Theory Test! FREE PASS GUARANTEE Weâ€™re so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your Â£23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&Câ€™s apply**. LEARNER PLAN Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish. LEADERBOARD Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! VOICEOVER English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia. HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST 85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test. THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover. ROAD SIGNS 2025 Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions. Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT Includes: â€¢ 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test â€¢ The top 10 reasons for failing â€¢ Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety â€¢ A full mock driving test with examiner debrief â€¢ All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign Helping you get one step closer to your full DVLA licence EXCLUSIVE BONUS CONTENT Access to exclusive offers and discounts! RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE â€¢ Ranked #1 in Forbes Healthâ€™s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025. â€¢ Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. â€¢ Praised by The New York Times as â€œsimpler, quicker, and better-lookingâ€ than other apps. â€¢ Featured in Todayâ€™s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom. DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS â€¢ Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads. â€¢ Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless. â€¢ Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy. â€¢ Privacy Focused: No account required. MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world. PROVEN SUCCESS â€¢ Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week â€¢ Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps A few of the free version features: â€¢ Easy food, exercise, and water tracking. â€¢ Daily coaching tips and meal reminders. â€¢ Customizable dashboard for your goals. â€¢ iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support. â€¢ Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos. SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES â€¢ Up to 108 nutrients tracked â€¢ Plan macros â€¢ Full set of charts â€¢ Timestamps â€¢ Carb tracking If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find: â€¢ Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback. â€¢ Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols. â€¢ Macros planning and cycling. â€¢ Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos. â€¢ Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition. â€¢ Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings. â€¢ In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal.
